des: "This is a very quick and tasty great salmon salad that can be eaten as a sandwich on thickly sliced specialty bread (fantastic on foccacia). To serve as a salad, mound mixture on a bed of lettuce, or on an avocado half."
ins: In a bowl, combine salmon, green onions, celery, mayonnaise, and lemon juice.  Season with dill and salt.  Mix well.
